markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2578) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental. Once per day, you can cast [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=98) as a 7th-level primal innate spell, but you can only choose the earth elemental form.
name: Stone Form
